english.segment1: When I first spoke Your name. I used it like a blade. Cutting sharp a mask to hide the pain. When I first spoke Your name
english.segment2: When I next spoke Your name. I could no longer bear the weight. Of years hiding behind the ache. When I next spoke Your name
english.segment3: But when You spoke my name. Oh I swear the angels sang. Peace came and stole my shame. When You spoke my name
english.segment4: Now when I speak Your name. I sing it like a sweet refrain. I have found a peace I can't explain. When I speak Your name
english.segment5: Cause when You spoke my name. Oh I swear the angels sang. Peace came and stole my shame. When You spoke my name
english.segment6: I can hardly speak. Knowing You know me. Thank God I'm free
english.segment7: Now my world has completely come undone. For I can hear the Son. Calling out to me
english.segment8: Cause when You spoke my name. Oh I swear the angels sang. Peace came and stole my shame
